parameters.name: workingDirectory
parameters.description: absolute path of the README.md where the code will be generated

tools.name: rename-cmdlet
tools.description: rename autorest generated powershell cmdlet by providing autorest directive to README.md

parameters.name: directive
parameters.description: autorest directive to rename cmdlet. Should perform something like 'where subject' and 'set subject'. Look for example in README.md
